entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:15 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sparwood Airport 4:35 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: SSE 18 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow except snow at times heavy near Fernie. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm near Fernie. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow over southwestern sections in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
